law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Approved project" means a project that the Department approves under § 6-405 of this subtitle.

"Business entity" means a person that conducts a trade or business in the State and is subject to:
the State income tax on individuals or corporations;
the public service company franchise tax; or
the insurance premiums tax.
"Individual" means an individual as defined under § 10-101 of the Tax - General Article.
"Nonprofit organization" means a not for profit corporation, foundation, or other legal entity that is exempt from federal income tax under § 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code.
"Priority funding area" means a priority funding area under § 5-7B-02 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.
"Redevelopment assistance" means the money that nonprofit organizations spend for labor and materials used directly in the physical improvement of part or all of a priority funding area.
